featured.text: our plan for the weekend picnic because of the bad weather.
Completely wheelchair-accessible, the park features 25 acres of attractions including rides, playgrounds, a catch-and-release fishing lake, and picnic areas throughout the park.

definition.zh_def: 野餐，指在戶外享用食物的活動，通常與朋友或家人一起進行。
definition.en_def: A picnic is an outdoor meal eaten in a relaxed manner, often with family or friends.
definition.example: We decided to have a picnic in the park on Saturday.
